verses.1: Mi a tul tampite hong kikhawmin khatlekhat a kisik kha gawp dongin kinehcipin a om laitakin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah thu gen masa a, “Farisi miteʼ kineihkhemna ahi, a silngo uh limtakin kidawm un.
verses.2: A kiseelte khatvei teitei kimu dinga, thusimte khatvei teitei thulang suak ding hi.
verses.3: Zan khuamial sunga na gente uh sun khuavak sungah kigenkik dinga, inn sung tawng ah na kihuau simnate uh mi khempeuh in thei thang ding uh hi.
verses.4: “Lawmte aw, note kiangah kong genin ah, pumpi a thah khit ciangin a sia zaw a hih thei nawn lote na kihta kei un.
verses.5: Kuate kihta ding na hi uh hiam cih leh, mite in a thah khit sa mipa pen hell khuk sungah a khia thuah thei lai Pasian na kihta un.
verses.6: Gitta nga ciangin hamu-in kizuak lel hi lo ahi hiam? Tua bang hi lel napi-in Pasian in gitta khat beek mangngilh lo hi.
verses.7: Na lutung uh a om na sam mal zah ciat nangawn uh Pasian in thei khin hi. Note lunghimawh kei un. Gitta tampi sangin na manpha zaw ciat uh hi.
verses.8: “Note kiangah kong cih in ah, keima mi ahihna miʼ theihin a gen khiate, Mihing Tapa in zong Pasianʼ vantung miteʼ mai ah, keima mi hi, ci-in gen khia dinga,
verses.9: ahi zongin keima mi ahihna miʼ theihin a gen khia nuam lote, Pasianʼ vantung mite mai ah zong keima mi hi, ci-in Mihing Tapa in gen khia nuam lo ding hi.
verses.10: Mihing Tapa a langpangte a mawhna uh kimaisak thei dinga, Kha Siangtho a langpangte a mawhna uh kimaisak lo ding hi.
verses.11: Thusitna a thuak dingin kikhopna inn ah ahi a, hausa zumah ahi zongin hong paipih uh ciangin bang gen dinga, bangci kihut ding ka hi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un.
verses.12: Bang hang hiam cih leh a hun a tun ciangin Kha Siangtho in na gen ding teng uh hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.13: Tua laitakin mihon lak panin mi khat in Jesu kiangah, “Sia aw, ka pa un a hong sihsan gamh pawl khat tawh ka u in kei hong inntuan nadingin hong gensak in,” a ci hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin Jesu in a mipa kiangah, “No unauʼ gamh a hawm dingin kua in kei hong seh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham loh nadingun kikem un. Bang hang hiam cih leh bangzah ta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zo lo hi,” a ci hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah thu gentehna khat gen a, “Mihau pa khatʼ lo ah an tampi a piang hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka an khempeuh ka koih nading mun kicing lo ahih manin bang cih ding ka hi hiam?
verses.18: Tua ahih manin hih bangin ka gamta ding hi: Ka ansalte phelin a lian zaw ansalte ka lam dinga, tuate sungah ka ante le ka neih khempeuh ka seng ding hi.
verses.19: Tua ciangin keimah in: Mi hampha mahmah ka hi hi. Kum tampi sung ka khom ding an nek tui dawn le na hoih tampi ka nei hi. An ne, zu ne-in, a nuam theithei-in ka om hithiat ding hi,’ ci hi.
verses.20: Ahi zongin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mihai pa aw, tu zan mahmah in na si ding hi. Hih na neihsa teng kuaʼn zang nawn ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Tua ciangin Jesu in a thugen a khupna-in, “Tua mah bangin amau ading bekin a kholcipte pen Pasianʼ muhna panin mihau hi lo uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.22: Tua ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin ah: I nuntak nadingin bang ne dinga, i pumpi tungah bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un.
verses.23: Nuntakna pen an sangin thupi zaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupi zaw hi.
verses.24: Vasate ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in khai tuh lo uh a, an lak cih zong nei lo uh hi. Amaute in beemlepang zong nei lo napi-in Pasian in annek tasamsak lo hi. Vasate sangin note nakpi takin na manpha zaw uh hi.
verses.25: Note na lunghihmawh manun na nuntak hun uh nai khat sung bek a sot to thei kua om na hi uh hiam?
verses.26: Tua bang a themno khat nangawn hih thei lo na hih uh leh bang hangin a dangte lunghimawh se na hi uh hiam?
verses.27: Gamlak a paakte ngaihsun dih un. Tuate in a nek ding uh na sem lo uh a, a silh ding uh puan zong gan lo uh hi. Ahi zongin note kiangah kong genin ah: Bangzahin a hauh hangin Solomon nangawn, hih paakte khat zahin a hoihin kizem zo lo lai hi.
verses.28: Upna neu mite aw, tu ni-in om a, zing ciangin keutumin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum lopa kungte, Pasian in puansilh guan ahihleh note hong guan zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.29: Tua ahih manin bang ne ding, bang dawn ding, ci-in lunghimawhin om tawntung kei un.
verses.30: Gentail mi khempeuh in hih nate lunghihmawh penin nei uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lamtak uh zong na Pa un hong thei hi.
verses.31: Tua ahih manin Pasianʼ Ukna ngaihsutin nei masa zaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte uh zong Pasian in hong pia thuah ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.32: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Tuu hon tawmnote aw, lau-in lunghimawh kei un. Na Pa un ama Ukna sungah ukna thu a nei dingin a hong seh sa ahi hi.
verses.33: Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note adingin a sia thei lo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawh lohna, leikha in zong a nek zawh lohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei het loh nading mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.
verses.34: Bang hang hiam cih leh na sum uh a omna munah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.35: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Na kawng uh gakin, na mei uh vakin a kiging sa-in om unla,
verses.36: a topa uh mopawi simna panin hong tungin kongkhak a kiuh ciangin thakhatin kong a hon pah theih nadingun a topaʼ ciah ding a ngak nasemte bangin om un.
verses.37: A topa hong ciah ciangin a kiging sa-in amah ngakin a om uh a muh nasemte pen mi hampha mahmah ahi uh hi. Note kiangah kong genin ah, a topa zong hong kithawi-in a nasemte an vak dingin tusak dinga, a mahmah in a nasemte an thukin na a sem ding hi.
verses.38: Zankim laitak ahi a, zingsang khuavak kuan lam ahi zongin a hong ciah hun peuhpeuh ciangin amah ngakin a om a muh nasemte pen mi hampha mahmah ahi uh hi.
verses.39: Ahi zongin na phawk ding uh thu khat om hi. Mi khat in guta paʼ hong pai ding hun thei khol leh a inn luhsak lo ding hi.
verses.40: Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong na upmawh loh uh hun laitakin hong pai ding ahih manin note zong a kiging sa-in om tawntung un,” a ci hi.
verses.41: Peter in, “Topa aw, hih thu gentehna ko bek nong cihna ahi hiam, ahih kei leh mi khempeuh ading na cihna ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
verses.42: Topa in, “A pil a citak nasem pa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A nasep pih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amauteʼ nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasem pa ahi hi.
verses.43: A topa hong ciah ciangin hih ama sawl bangin a sem a muh nasem pa pen mi hampha mahmah ahi hi.
verses.44: Keʼn kong cih in ah, a neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasem pa koih takpi ding hi.
verses.45: Ahi zongin tua nasem pa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a nasep pih numei le pasalte sat gawp henla, zukham ankhamin om mawk leh,
verses.46: tua nasem paʼ topa pen ama upmawh loh ni, a theih kholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpi takin amah gim pia dinga, a thumang lo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi.
verses.47: A topaʼ deihna thei napi-in a topaʼ deih bangin a gamta nuam lo nasem pa pen nakpi takin kisat ding hi.
verses.48: Ahi zongin a topaʼ deihna a theih lohna hangin sat thuak nading a gamta kha nasem pa pen kidam sat zaw deuh ding hi. Tampi a kipiakna pa tung pan tampi kikal dinga, a tam zaw a ki-apna pa tung pan a tam zaw kikal ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.49: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Leitungah meikuang a khah dingin a hong pai ka hi a, tu mahmah in a meikuang kipan khinta hileh ka ut hi.
verses.50: Gimna sungah ka kiphum nading khat om a, tua thu a kikhit matengin ka lungsim a nuam thei kei hi.
verses.51: Leitungah kilemna a omsak dingin a hong pai hong sa na hi uh hiam? Hi lo hi. Keʼn kong cih in ah, kikhenna a omsak dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi.
verses.52: Tu a kipanin innkuan sungah mihing nga a phate, a langah thum, a langah nihin kikhenin kido ding uh hi.
verses.53: A pa in a tapa do-in, a tapa in a pa do dinga, a nu in a tanu do-in, a tanu in a nu do dinga, a teeknu in a monu do-in, a monu in a teeknu do ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.54: Jesu in mihonte kiangah zong, “Nitumna lamah meiipi hong kai na muh uh ciangin, ‘Guah hong zu ding hi,’ ci-in thakhatin na gen thei pah uh a, tua mah bangin guah hong zu takpi hi.
verses.55: Leitaw lam panin huih hong nun ciangin, ‘Ni hong sa ding hi,’ na ci uh a, tua mah bangin ni hong sa takpi hi.
verses.56: No a kineihkhem mite aw, vanlelei na et uh ciangin a piang ding thu thei na hih uh leh, tu hun thute bang hangin theithei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.57: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Bang hangin na gamtat nading uh a manin khen thei lo na hi uh hiam?
verses.58: Mi khatpeuh in na tungah thu hong bawlin zum ah hong paipih leh, zum a, thukhente mai ah hong kai gawpin, thukhente in palikte kiangah hong apin, palikte in thong sungah a hong koih loh nadingin, na lang pa uh tawh na thu uh a sian theih nadingin na siam tawpun lamkal ah hanciam un.
verses.59: Keʼn kong cih in ah, tua bangin gamta kei le-uhcin, na liau sum uh na piak khit matengun thong panin na suakta kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
